mapper.insert: insert into company_tb (company_name, company_password, company_email, created_at) values(#{companyName}, #{companyPassword}, #{companyEmail}, now())
mapper.update: update company_tb set company_name= #{companyName}, company_password= #{companyPassword}, company_email= #{companyEmail} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from company_tb where company_name = #{companyName} and company_password = #{companyPassword}
